error.no_credentials: ERROR: No credentials - should never happen.
error.csrf_token_mismatch: CSRF token mismatch, possible cross-site request forgery attempt.
error.something_broke: Something went wrong in the authorization process. Please try again. __error__

message.authorisation_successful: <html><head></head><body>Authorisation successful - you can close this window and return to Node-RED</body></html>
message.help_text: OAuth2 client for getting oauth2 credentials by the authorization flow to use in other nodes. Credentials are automatically refreshed on expiration.
